import { useState } from 'react' import '../stylesheets/Profile.css'; import Back from './BackButton'; import Quit from './QuitButton'; function SettingsPage() { const data = { id: 1, nameFirst: 'Gunner', nameLast: 'Peterson', address: '14 Old Farm Road', phone:'7814921706', isDriver:true, email: 'Gunnerpeterson14@gmail.com', ridesGiven:0, ridesTaken:0, carCapacity:2, } if(localStorage.getItem('userData') != null){ const data = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('userData')) } const [details, setDetails] = useState({firstname:data.nameLast, lastname:data.nameFirst, address:data.address, phone:data.phone, status:data.isDriver, carCapacity:data.carCapacity}) return(

Settings

setDetails({...details, address: e.target.value})} value={details.address}/>


setDetails({...details, phone: e.target.value})} value={details.phone}/>



) } export default SettingsPage
